languages.text: "Вот это будет славная битва! Будь осторож{mf|ен|на} с сим языкастым изменником, ибо он стар, хитер и силен. Но, клянусь Всеотцом, Волки сегодня прольют вдосталь его гнилой крови!" {n}Представший перед вами ужас нечестивого колдовства не испугал, а, кажется, лишь развеселил и распалил гордого Космического Десантника.{/n}

"A glorious fight awaits! Take heed with the silver-tongued traitor, for he is old, sly, and strong. But, by the Allfather, the Wolves will spill rivers of his blood today!" {n}The horrific display of profane sorcery appears to have filled Thorbald with joy and anticipation rather than fear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вот это будет славная битва! Будь осторож{mf|ен|на} с сим языкастым изменником, ибо он стар, хитер и силен. Но, клянусь Всеотцом, Волки сегодня прольют вдосталь его гнилой крови!" {n}Представший перед вами ужас нечестивого колдовства не испугал, а, кажется, лишь развеселил и распалил гордого Космического Десантника.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "A good fight awaits! Take heed with the silver-tongued traitor, for he is old, sly, and strong. But, by the Allfather, the Wolves will spill rivers of his blood today!" {n}The horrific display of profane sorcery appears to have filled Thorbald with joy and anticipation rather than fear.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: “光荣的战斗在等待着我们！要当心那个巧舌如簧的叛徒，因为那条老狐狸又狡猾、又强壮！不过，以全父的名义，他今天就会死在狼口之下！”{n}充满亵渎意味的巫术似乎并没有让索巴德感到恐惧，而是让他充满了喜悦与期待。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A glorious fight awaits! Take heed with the silver-tongued traitor, for he is old, sly, and strong. But, by the Allfather, the Wolves will spill rivers of his blood today!" {n}The horrific display of profane sorcery appears to have filled Thorbald with joy and anticipation rather than fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “光荣的战斗在等待着我们！要当心那个巧舌如簧的叛徒，因为那条老狐狸又狡猾、又强壮！不过，以全父的名义，他今天就会死在狼口之下！”{n}充满亵渎意味的巫术似乎并没有让索巴德感到恐惧，而是让他充满了喜悦与期待。{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: « Un glorieux combat nous attend ! Méfiez-vous du traître aux belles paroles : il est âgé, rusé et puissant. Mais par le Père de Tous, aujourd'hui, les Loups vont faire couler son sang à flots ! » {n}Thorbald trépigne d'impatience, comme si l'horrible spectacle de sorcellerie profane l'avait empli de joie plutôt que de peur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A glorious fight awaits! Take heed with the silver-tongued traitor, for he is old, sly, and strong. But, by the Allfather, the Wolves will spill rivers of his blood today!" {n}The horrific display of profane sorcery appears to have filled Thorbald with joy and anticipation rather than fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un glorieux combat nous attend ! Méfiez-vous du traître aux belles paroles : il est âgé, rusé et puissant. Mais par le Père de Tous, aujourd'hui, les Loups vont faire couler son sang à flots ! » {n}Thorbald trépigne d'impatience, comme si l'horrible spectacle de sorcellerie profane l'avait empli de joie plutôt que de peur.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: 「輝かしい戦いが待っている！雄弁な裏切り者には用心しろ。奴は年老いているがずる賢く、強い。しかし、全知の父によって狼たちは今日、奴の血を川のごとく流すだろう！」{n}恐ろしい魔術を目の当たりにしたトールバルドは、恐怖よりもむしろ喜びと期待で満たされたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A glorious fight awaits! Take heed with the silver-tongued traitor, for he is old, sly, and strong. But, by the Allfather, the Wolves will spill rivers of his blood today!" {n}The horrific display of profane sorcery appears to have filled Thorbald with joy and anticipation rather than fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「輝かしい戦いが待っている！雄弁な裏切り者には用心しろ。奴は年老いているがずる賢く、強い。しかし、全知の父によって狼たちは今日、奴の血を川のごとく流すだろう！」{n}恐ろしい魔術を目の当たりにしたトールバルドは、恐怖よりもむしろ喜びと期待で満たされたようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: «¡Nos espera una gloriosa batalla! Cuidado con ese traidor lenguaraz, porque es viejo, astuto y poderoso. Pero, por el Padre de todas las cosas, ¡los Lobos derramaremos ríos de su sangre hoy!». {n}El espantoso despliegue de hechicería blasfema parece haber llenado a Thorbald de júbilo y anticipación en vez de miedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A glorious fight awaits! Take heed with the silver-tongued traitor, for he is old, sly, and strong. But, by the Allfather, the Wolves will spill rivers of his blood today!" {n}The horrific display of profane sorcery appears to have filled Thorbald with joy and anticipation rather than fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Nos espera una gloriosa batalla! Cuidado con ese traidor lenguaraz, porque es viejo, astuto y poderoso. Pero, por el Padre de todas las cosas, ¡los Lobos derramaremos ríos de su sangre hoy!». {n}El espantoso despliegue de hechicería blasfema parece haber llenado a Thorbald de júbilo y anticipación en vez de miedo.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Es wartet ein glorreicher Kampf! Achtet auf den silberzüngigen Verräter, denn er ist alt, verschlagen und stark. Aber beim Allvater, die Wölfe werden heute Flüsse seines Bluts vergießen!" {n}Die grauenhafte profane Hexerei scheint Thorbald mit Freude und zu erfüllen, nicht mit Angst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A glorious fight awaits! Take heed with the silver-tongued traitor, for he is old, sly, and strong. But, by the Allfather, the Wolves will spill rivers of his blood today!" {n}The horrific display of profane sorcery appears to have filled Thorbald with joy and anticipation rather than fear.{/n}

Aber beim Allvater, die Wölfe werden heute Flüsse seines Bluts vergießen!" {n}Die grauenhafte profane Hexerei scheint Thorbald mit Freude und zu erfüllen, nicht mit Angst.{/n}
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: "Görkemli bir savaş bizi bekliyor! Tatlı dilli haine karşı gardınızı indirmeyin zira kendisi kıdemli, sinsi ve güçlüdür. Ancak Yücebaba şahidim olsun ki Kurtlar'ın kudretiyle bugün kan gövdeyi götürecek!" {n}Kâfirce sahirliğin dehşet saçan görüntüsü karşısında Thorbald'ın yüreği; korkuyla değil, neşeyle doluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A glorious fight awaits! Take heed with the silver-tongued traitor, for he is old, sly, and strong. But, by the Allfather, the Wolves will spill rivers of his blood today!" {n}The horrific display of profane sorcery appears to have filled Thorbald with joy and anticipation rather than fear.{/n}
